mapper.update: update t_car set car_num = #{carNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guide_price = #{guidePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, produce_time = #{produceTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, car_num, brand, guide_price, produce_time, car_type from t_car
